DataByte

The official Data Science and Buisness Analytics club of NIT Trichy

Induction Thirumathikart

About Us

DataByte is the data science and business analytics club of NIT, Trichy. At DataByte, we focus on developing interest in niche fields of business analysis and computational finance, among others, through active discussion and facility of data handling techniques.

Mission

We aim to foster a budding student community with the ability to solve real time problems with the effective use of ML algorithms.

Vision

To promote and foster innovative machine learning solutions for the betterment of the community.


WHAT WE DO?

Computer Vision

Computer vision helps to understand the complexity of the human vision system and trains computer systems to interpret and gain a high-level understanding of digital images or videos
